title: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
content:
feated them and had them chased all the way to this inn. However, she seems to have some hope in you. You can respond to this with the following choices:

What do you have in mind? You think I can kill him? I don’t think so.

Her plan is to have you infiltrate his base as a True Soul and find out how to deactivate his invincibility. You’ll have the following options to reply with:

Ketheric’s days are numbered. I’ll make sure of it. You want to make use of my infection - I want to be cured of it
